column2: "Mmm, that's good! You are an excellent ARKS, as I thought. I'm glad all my baseless fears were put to rest."
"If you've edited your ARKS ID, you can freely see other players using the visiphone."
"If you're interested in an ARKS, your first stop is the ARKS Search on the visiphone!"
"Okay, I will also use my ARKS ID..."
